short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension "crypto follow", let u follow crypto, fiat currency and assets always in your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It is a bar designed to be displayed floating above the web pages, just below the browser's shortcut bar, it allows the display of the price of assets, cryptocurrencies, fiat money, and more. with update minute-minute. you can hide it temporarily by double-clicking.
